name: opentutor
description: Self-hosted AI language tutor for WhatsApp with local Ollama, Faster-Whisper, and Piper.

scripts.dev: node -e "const {spawn}=require('child_process'); const path=require('path'); const isWin=process.platform==='win32'; const script=path.join('scripts', isWin ? 'dev-run-all.ps1' : 'dev-run-all.sh'); const cmd=isWin ? 'powershell' : 'bash'; const args=isWin ? ['-ExecutionPolicy','Bypass','-File',script] : [script]; const p=spawn(cmd,args,{stdio:'inherit', shell:false}); p.on('exit', c => process.exit(c ?? 0));"
